SELECT msd.schedule_detail_id, msd.organization_id, msd.schedule_id, msd.work_order_id, msd.order_id, msd.is_delete, msd.remark, msd.create_user_id, msd.create_time, msd.modified_user_id, msd.modified_time, swo.work_order_code as 'workOrderCode', so.order_code as 'orderCode', so.contract_code as 'contractCode', spm.product_model_name as 'productModelName', sm.material_code as 'materialCode', sm.version, sm.material_desc as 'materialDesc', swo.work_order_quantity as 'workOrderQuantity' FROM fantech_imes.mes_schedule_detail AS msd LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_work_order swo on swo.work_order_id = msd.work_order_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_order so on so.order_id = msd.order_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_material sm on sm.material_id = swo.material_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_tab bt on bt.material_id = sm.material_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_product_model spm on spm.product_model_id = bt.product_model_id
and msd.schedule_id = #{scheduleId}
and msd.is_delete = 1
order by msd.modified_time desc
